title: hello please... what is the name of this font
author: mastervampwolf

comments.content:
I have spent some time looking for this, but couldn't find the exact font. I think this is a commercial font, because it looks like it has ligatures for the 'tu' and 'ti' combinations. Most amateur freebies don't go to that trouble.

Unfortunately, hand-drawn fonts are too numerous to have a good chance of locating the identical one, so I suggest finding anything similar. [Casino Hand](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317201620/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/madtype/casino-hand/?refby=bowfin) from MADType is a good realistic OTF font that is fairly similar.

- Mike Yanega
